original_title: 仮面ライダーディケイド 守れ！てれびくんの世界
overview: Styled as a  "Choose Your Own Adventure" story. The viewer's choices throughout the DVD affect how Decade and Diend's fight against Dai-Shocker's Televi Bae-Kun plays out, as well as Yusuke Onodera's completion of the Decade Bazooka weapon from a punch out sheet in the back of a Televi-Kun magazine.
title: Kamen Rider Decade: Protect! The World of Televikun
